post.description: Creates a new receipt entry. This operation enables a provider company to post receipts to Concur.

Name.description: The name of the custom field. Maximum length: 128 characters

Value.description: The value of the custom field. Maximum length: 256 characters

AverageDailyRoomRate.description: The sum of the room rate for each night stayed, divided by the number of nights stayed. Range: -922,337,203,685,477 to 922,337,203,685,477

CheckinDateTime.description: The check-in date and time. Format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm

CheckoutDateTime.description: The check-out date and time. Format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm

ConfirmationNumber.description: The confirmation number for the booking. Maximum length: 32 characters

GNR.description: The Guest Name Record (GNR) for the stay. Maximum length: 20 characters

NumberInParty.description: The number of people for this stay.

RatePlanType.description: The rate plan type that is used to calculate the room rate. Possible values are rate plan types defined using hospitality industry standards. Maximum length: 50 characters

RoomNumber.description: The room number for the stay. Maximum length: 15 characters

RoomType.description: The type of room. Possible values are room types defined using hospitality industry standards, such as Single, Double, Suite, and so on. Maximum length: 50 characters

Amount.description: The total charged amount for the line item. Range: -922,337,203,685,477 to 922,337,203,685,477

Date.description: The date and time when the line item was charged. Format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm

Description.description: The item's description. Maximum length: 100 characters

Description2.description: Additional details about the item. In the receipt image, the secondary description appears on the line following the primary description. Maximum length: 32 characters

Quantity.description: The quantity of units. Format: Any positive number

Rate.description: The amount charged per unit. Range: -922,337,203,685,477 to 922,337,203,685,477

RateType.description: The unit of measure or rate type. Possible values: HOUR or PER HOUR, DAY or PER DAY, WEEK or PER WEEK, MONTH or PER MONTH. Maximum length: 10 characters

Reference.description: The item's SKU, identifier, or some other attribute the provider uses to reference the item. Maximum length: 32 characters

SequenceNumber.description: The order in which the item appears in the sequence of line items.

Address.description: The provider's street address. Maximum length: 100 characters

Address2.description: The provider's secondary street address. Maximum length: 50 characters

City.description: The provider's city. Maximum length: 100 characters

CountryCode.description: The provider's country. Format: 2-letter ISO 3166-1 country code

CountrySubdivisionCode.description: The provider's state, province, or other country subdivision. Format: ISO 3166-2:2007 country subdivision code YYY, where YYY is the one-to-threeâ€“character subdivision code

EmailAddress.description: The provider's email address. Maximum length: 255 characters

FaxNumber.description: The provider's fax number. Maximum length: 32 characters

InternetAddress.description: The provider's Web address. Maximum length: 255 characters

Name.description: The name of the provider's location, such as an airport, car rental agency, property, store, or other named location. Maximum length: 100 characters

PostalCode.description: The provider's postal code. Maximum length: 20 characters

TelephoneNumber.description: The provider's telephone number. Maximum length: 100 characters

Type.description: The type of matching fact that is used to identify the Concur user who owns the receipt. Possible values: OAuth, Login

Value.description: The value of the matching fact. If the Type element is set to OAuth, this value must be the access token for the Concur user who owns the receipt. In this case, the access token must not be expired or revoked. If the Type element is set to Login, this value must be the login ID of the Concur user who owns the receipt.

Name.description: The name of the provider (merchant). Maximum length: 64 characters

AuthorizationCode.description: The authorization code that the card interchange provided when it approved this purchase. Maximum length: 15 characters

MaskedNumber.description: The masked card number for the credit card. With the exception of the AX (American Express) card type, this is the last four digits of the card number. For American Express, the value can be one of these, in order of preference: a) The first six digits and the last four digits of the card number. b) The last five digits. c) The last four digits.

Type.description: The card interchange for the credit card. Possible values: AX (American Express), DC (Diner's Club), DS (Discover), CA (MasterCard), VI (Visa), CB (Carte Blanche), ER (Enroute), TP (Universal Air Travel), JC (JCB), EC (EuroCard), OTHER (other types)

Amount.description: The net amount of the transaction. A positive number means a payment is due. A negative number means a refund is due. Zero means no payment or refund is due. Range: -922,337,203,685,477 to 922,337,203,685,477

CurrencyCode.description: The 3-letter ISO 4217 currency code for the currency paid to the provider.

FormofPaymentCode.description: The code for the form of payment. Possible values: CASH (Cash), CCARD (Credit Card), CPAID (Company Paid)

ImageBase64.description: The binary receipt image in Base64 encoding. This API supports PNG, JPEG, JPG, and PDF file formats.

TransactionDateTime.description: The date and time when the transaction happened. Format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm

Type.description: The type of receipt. Possible values: General, Ride, Hotel

DriverName.description: The name of the driver. Maximum length: 255 characters

DropoffLatitude.description: The latitude of the ride end location. Range: -90 to 90

DropoffLongitude.description: The longitude of the ride end location. Range: -180 to 180

EndDateTime.description: The ending date and time for the ride. Format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm

StartDateTime.description: The starting date and time for the ride. Format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm

VehicleNumber.description: The unique identifier for the vehicle. Maximum length: 50 characters
